name: @entur/reduce-customers-for-offer-configuration
description: Returns a subset of the supplied customer array, containing only the elements necessary to purchase the given offer as described by the supplied offerConfiguration
author: Eirik Vageskar <eirik.vageskar@knowit.no>

scripts.update-types: npx swagger-typescript-api --path https://api.staging.entur.io/sales/v1/offers/api-docs/swagger.json --output source/types/__generated__  -n offersTypes.ts --no-client && npx swagger-typescript-api --path https://api.staging.entur.io/offers/v2-beta/api-docs/swagger.json --output source/types/__generated__  -n offers2Types.ts --no-client && npx swagger-typescript-api --path https://api.staging.entur.io/api-docs/reserve-offer?group=public --output source/types/__generated__  -n reserveOfferTypes.ts --no-client
